http://statistics.data.gov.uk/id/statist: function rewrite(word, digits){ return 'statistic/' + word + digits}
http://data.mksmart.org/tmpns/ward/(\\w*: function rewrite(word){var geocodes = { '00MGNN':'Loughton Park Ward', '00MGNW':'Stony Stratford Ward', '00MGNZ':'Wolverton Ward', '00MGNS':'Olney Ward', '00MGNE':'Danesborough Ward', '00MGNP':'Middleton Ward', '00MGNK':'Hanslope Park Ward', '00MGNT':'Sherington Ward', '00MGNY':'Whaddon Ward', '00MGNH':'Emerson Valley Ward', '00MGNC':'Bradwell Ward', '00MGNU':'Stantonbury Ward', '00MGNG':'Eaton Manor Ward', '00MGNF':'Denbigh Ward', '00MGNB':'Bletchley and Fenny Stratford Ward', '00MGPA':'Woughton Ward', '00MGND':'Campbell Park Ward', '00MGNX':'Walton Park Ward', '00MGNM':'Linford South Ward', '00MGNL':'Linford North Ward', '00MGNR':'Newport Pagnell South Ward', '00MGNQ':'Newport Pagnell North Ward', '00MGNJ':'Furzton Ward' };  if (geocodes[word]) return 'ward/'+ geocodes[word].toLowerCase().replace(/ /g,'_').replace(/_ward/g,''); else return '';}
